title: Calendly Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with Calendly platform for scheduling and calendar management

specs.title: Create Calendly connection with valid OAuth credentials
specs.given: valid Calendly OAuth client ID and secret from Calendly developer console
specs.when: user creates a new Calendly connection
specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

specs.title: Reject Calendly connection with invalid credentials
specs.when: user attempts to create Calendly connection
specs.then: system returns validation error indicating credential issue

specs.title: Update Calendly connection name
specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
